response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, with its worth estimated at $800,000. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, I propose a special introductory offer of $750,000 for this masterpiece. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget, allowing you to secure this remarkable piece at a competitive price. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 750000}
